title: Does being/sharing in the ontological category of alien with Yahweh speak to Israel's property of eternality?
author: joshualinog
labels: Ontological Mereology of GOD | Nature of GOD
excerpt: Leviticus 25:23 HB2 25:23 וְהָאָרֶץ לֹא תִמָּכֵר לִצְמִתֻת כִּי־לִי הָאָרֶץ כִּי־גֵרִים וְתוֹשָׁבִים אַתֶּם עִמָּדִי: YLT 'And the land is not sold--to extinction, for the land is Mine, for sojourners
content:
Leviticus 25:23
HB2 25:23 וְהָאָרֶץ לֹא תִמָּכֵר לִצְמִתֻת כִּי־לִי הָאָרֶץ כִּי־גֵרִים וְתוֹשָׁבִים אַתֶּם עִמָּדִי:
YLT 'And the land is not sold--to extinction, for the land is Mine, for sojourners and settlers are ye with Me;
LEB “ ‘But the land must not be sold in perpetuity, because the land is mine, because you are aliens and temporary residents with me.
